storyInfo: GreyThroat rescues Tatjana from the crisis. After interrogating a rioter, Folinic learns the truth behind the Wolumonde riots as well as the existence of the Reunion Movement.

attributes.content: Nng...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Where am I...?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Argh—!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: (So dizzy...! But I can see... and hear.)
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: (I can't feel... my ankle.)
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: (It's so quiet. Where did everyone go?)
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: (Silent as the grave... Did the rioters just leave me here?)
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: You're awake.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Aaah?!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Calm down.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Oh, sorry! You startled me.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Huh? You... I know you. You're from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: GreyThroat, Operator.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Keep your voice down. We took care of the rebels in this area.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Took care of them...?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Even at this point, you still don't see them as the enemy.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Relax, most of them are still alive. Handed over to Officer Severin Hawthorn.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Oh, um... What about Miss Folinic?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: She's fine. I sent another operator to help her. But...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Did Atro really... sacrifice herself?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Yes. I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: That explains the way Folinic has been acting...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Just a few operators won't be able to retake this neighborhood on their own. We should fall back to the town center and regroup.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Right. Can you walk? You injured your ankle.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I... I can try. Ow...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Here, let me help.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: One more question, Miss Tatjana. When I came here with Atro, Wolumonde was still thriving.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: So what happened to all the Gendarmerie? There isn't a single one left in town.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Hng!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Put down your weapon. Look at yourself. You don't even have a decent set of clothes. You're going to fight like that?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: What do you outsiders know? What do you even get out of helping those noble puppets?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Nothing. I'm not interested in your politics at all. But... are you a Winterwisp?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Winterwisp...? Hah. I'm not aboriginal, but I do acknowledge their struggle!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: How about you? Dr. Atro was a good person, but you? You're just here to help them crush us!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Wolumonde, no, all of Leithanien is rotten to the core! Today they burn the Infected alive, tomorrow it will be the entire working class!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Where's your proof?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There's not a single Gendarmerie in Wolumonde! Not one!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Why do you think that is?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Wolumonde and several surrounding towns formed a collective settlement network. When the Catastrophe struck, there were not enough Gendarmerie to care for all of the—
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Oh really? If it was that simple, nobody would mind!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Enough stalling. Out with it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: For a wedding.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: A wedding?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Some great nobleman in his high tower married the only daughter of another nobleman, so they sent all the Gendarmerie over to the nearest nomadic city!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: And how long do you think the aristocrats' drunken revelries are gonna last? You wanna guess?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Oh and I almost forgot about the part where the nobles argued back and forth for a month about whose city should move to whose territory.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: So our Gendarmerie had to go stand around some fancy mansions to boost a fortunate son's ego, and maybe keep out the riffraff. Isn't that funny? Are you laughing?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Because I'm not.
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: No, it's not funny. But that still doesn't give me any leads as to the fire.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Think about it: who's going to set fire to a medical camp that treats Infected? Would the Infected do that?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: It could only be someone who wants to see the Infected suffer. You should be on our side—
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: —The side of Reunion!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Schultz! The rebels refuse to surrender!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: There aren't many of them...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The truly horrific thing about this disaster is that both sides are ordinary civilians. There are no warriors here.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We should do everything we can to avoid the worst case scenario.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: GreyThroat! Miss Tatjana! You're back!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: And we're going to make the murderer pay for their crimes.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Tatjana!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Uncle... I'm sorry. I was careless...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: No... All that matters is that you're safe.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Operator Folinic. Glad to see you safe and sound.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: GreyThroat, I recall it was you who came with Atro to Wolumonde?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Do you know what happened?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: ...I've got the gist of it.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Do you think... If you were with her, that things would've turned out differently?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic, you shouldn't—
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No. The myriad contradictions this crisis has revealed in Wolumonde can't be solved by external forces. There is nothing we could've done.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But at least... I should have been there with her, to do what I could.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I'm sorry I wasn't with her.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No... *Sigh*. It was wrong of me to push that on you just to make myself feel better. What the hell am I doing...?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm the one who should be sorry.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: People.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Let me start by offering my sincere thanks to Rhodes Island for saving Tatjana.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is an organization dedicated to helping the Infected.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Severin Hawthorn, Leithanien is known for its lenient treatment of the Infected. But I still have to ask, before we get down to business—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: On behalf of Wolumonde, can you guarantee that Wolumonde has not, in light of these exceptional circumstances, taken 'additional measures' against the Infected population?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The investigations you carried out with Miss Suzuran should have corroborated this.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wolumonde has in no way, at no point, targeted the Infected. Nor have we ever held ill will toward Dr. Atro, who aided the Infected.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Are you satisfied?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Miss Folinic, I believe Mr. Severin.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Um... well... I'm not sure! But I do believe him! He wouldn't hurt Infected people!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Okay, Lisa. I'll trust your instincts, for now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Thank you for understanding.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Now, I'd like to hear your opinions on what to do next.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I'm not as familiar with the field as Folinic. I followed her instructions during the operation.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: There aren't a lot of them out there.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Counting those we have successfully subdued, there can't be more than a hundred or so.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A hundred or so rioters wouldn't be able to terrorize Wolumonde under normal circumstances.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: As for the Gendarmerie, I've heard some interesting rumors.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That was one of the very few unfortunate decisions I've made in my military career. We can't do anything about it, so let's shelve it for now.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Allow me to interject. I'd like to discuss that captive, who called himself 'Reunion.'
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We have made contact with a certain lone member of the Reunion Movement, and he has very little in common with the outraged citizenry.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: He's a battle-hardened warrior. And if he came with a squad, he could be a problem.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: The partisans. This is not good news.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Reunion...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Chernobog... Ursus... Gah... Not Ursus again...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Why should I believe a single word they say?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The fire was the trigger for all of this. But there was always a high risk of conflict.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Did these underlying problems cause the fire? Or was this fire the catalyst that revealed these problems?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Do we have a choice...? Do we have to fight?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: This is the choice that decides the fate of Wolumonde. Thousands of lives hang in the balance. We can't be hasty.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We should return to the Rathaus for a formal resolution.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hm. But it looks like the other side won't give us the chance.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If Reunion really is here, there's no need for a light touch.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Roger that. However, Folinic, you should stay here and tend to the wounded.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I'd rather get in there my—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Lisa, Operator Suzuran, is not a fully accredited medic operator. Only you are.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: You should prioritize protecting the innocent over defeating the enemy.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Miss Folinic... You should stay here.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: If you keep fighting that hard, that aggressively, you won't be you anymore.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Right... okay. I'll... stay.
attributes.name: Folinic
